turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a pick me up. Can you put in for a Starbucks order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What locations are you looking to order from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Im going to go with the one on Sheridan Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would like this Uber Eats or pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with Uber Eats since I am busy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. What you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two large caramel cloud machiatos with Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else with that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large iced caffe latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like two pieces of banana nut bread and a morning bun.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that be all for today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is going to be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How will you be paying for this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Use my gift card that I have on file with them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your total is $23:67. Order will be here in 15-20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Text me when its at the front.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do that for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
